definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: They prey mainly on sea lions, seals, and small toothed whales
sentences.chinese: 它們以海獅，海豹，小型齒鯨爲食。

sentences.english: The number of net entanglements has dramatically increased.
sentences.chinese: 因爲被魚網纏住而喪命的海獅數量明顯增加。

sentences.english: The U. S. Navy announced this week they are now using sea lions to fight terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 美國海軍本週宣佈，他們開始用海獅來打擊恐怖活動。

sentences.english: House Manning - A red sea lion between two black pallets on white.
sentences.chinese: 白色底紋上，兩條黑色的豎條之間有一頭紅色的海獅。

sentences.english: Mainly are vehicle of RHD type, such as HIACE series, etc.
sentences.chinese: 主要以各種右舵廂式車型車輛爲主，包括海獅系列等。

sentences.english: Sea lion numbers have not recovered.
Not so many California sea lions down there.
sentences.chinese: 那裏沒有那麼多的加利福尼亞海獅。

sentences.english: A sea lion feasts on dead fish in King Harbor in Redondo Beach, California on March 9.
sentences.chinese: 加州雷東多國王港內一隻海獅正享用一隻死魚。

definition: (bird species of China) black-faced spoonbill (Platalea minor)
(bird species of China) black-crowned night heron (Nycticorax nycticorax)
